person.persName: William A. Herron (Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, court clerk and entrepreneur)

body.p: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, court clerk and entrepreneur. Pennsylvania native. Marries to Louisa Herron. Father of John H. Herron and James Herron. Clerk of the Court of Quarter Sessions for Allegheny County in 1860 and 1865. President of the Pittsburgh & Minersville Railroad Co. in 1865. President of the Pittsburgh Glass Manufacturing Co. in 1865.
